event.Summary: Traffic imbalance detected in BP link bundle $v4 on NPU unit $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD F10-BPSTATS-MIB::bpLinkBundleImbalance F10-BPSTATS-MIB::bpLinkBundleType i 1 F10-BPSTATS-MIB::bpLinkBundleSlot i 9999 F10-BPSTATS-MIB::bpLinkBundleNpuUnit i 9999 F10-BPSTATS-MIB::bpLinkBundleLocalId i 9999

description: Indicates Type of Back plane HiGig link bundle
variables.name: F10-BPSTATS-MIB::bpLinkBundleType

description: The SlotId on which Link Bundle is overloaded
variables.name: F10-BPSTATS-MIB::bpLinkBundleSlot

description: The npuUnitId(BCM unit Id) on which Link Bundle is overloaded
variables.name: F10-BPSTATS-MIB::bpLinkBundleNpuUnit

description: The local linkBundle Id which is overloaded
variables.name: F10-BPSTATS-MIB::bpLinkBundleLocalId

description: is no longer observed on Bp Link bundles

event.Summary: Traffic imbalance cleared in BP link bundle $v4 on NPU unit $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD F10-BPSTATS-MIB::bpLinkBundleImbalanceClear F10-BPSTATS-MIB::bpLinkBundleType i 1 F10-BPSTATS-MIB::bpLinkBundleSlot i 9999 F10-BPSTATS-MIB::bpLinkBundleNpuUnit i 9999 F10-BPSTATS-MIB::bpLinkBundleLocalId i 9999

variables.name: F10-BPSTATS-MIB::bpLinkBundleType

description: The SlotId on which Link Bundle is overloaded
variables.name: F10-BPSTATS-MIB::bpLinkBundleSlot

description: The npuUnitId(BCM unit Id) on which Link Bundle is overloaded
variables.name: F10-BPSTATS-MIB::bpLinkBundleNpuUnit

description: The local linkBundle Id which is overloaded
variables.name: F10-BPSTATS-MIB::bpLinkBundleLocalId
